articles.title: Airbus orders software fix to thousands of planes due to solar radiation risk - TechCrunch
articles.description: Flights were delayed and cancelled globally after Airbus ordered fixes to 6,000 of its A320 series planes, according to The Guardian. The company said
articles.content:
Flights were delayed and cancelled globally after Airbus ordered fixes to 6,000 of its A320 series planes, according to The Guardian.
